definition: any of several small tropical Asian lizards capable of gliding by spreading winglike membranes on each side of the body
details:
noun
- any of several small tropical Asian lizards capable of gliding by spreading winglike membranes on each side of the body
= synonyms: flying dragon, flying lizard
- a creature of Teutonic mythology
= synonyms: firedrake
- a fiercely vigilant and unpleasant woman
= synonyms: tartar
